name: Fenty Beauty Gloss Bomb Universal Lip Luminizer
description: An ultimate, gotta-have-it lip gloss with explosive shine that feels as good as it looks.

name: r.e.m. beauty Midnight Shadows Lustrous Liquid Eyeshadow
description: Achieve effortless, crease-resistant color with a single stroke. Universally flattering shades glide on weightlessly and dry to a lustrous finish.

name: Laura Mercier Tinted Moisturizer Natural Skin Perfector
description: Lightweight, sheer coverage for a natural, dewy finish. Hydrates for 24 hours, locks in moisture, and protects with SPF 30 and antioxidants.

name: bareMinerals Original Loose Powder Foundation SPF 15
description: All-day coverage with a luminous finish. Blurs pores and imperfections while promoting clearer, healthier-looking skin. Won’t clog pores, cause breakouts, or settle into fine lines.

name: Fenty Beauty Pro Filt'r Soft Matte Longwear Foundation
description: Soft matte, buildable coverage that stays fresh all day. Climate-adaptive technology resists heat, sweat, and humidity while instantly absorbing oil for a shine-free finish. Lightweight, non-drying, and pore-blurring with 50 inclusive shades

name: Laura Mercier Translucent Loose Setting Powder
description: Instantly blurs pores, fine lines, and imperfections while extending makeup wear for up to 16 hours. Hydrating, lightweight, and shine-controlling with a natural, cake-free finish. Breathable, non-comedogenic, and suitable for all skin types

name: r.e.m. beauty On Your Collar Matte Lipstick
description: Intensely pigmented, weightless matte color with up to 16-hour wear. Hydrating formula glides on smoothly, locks in moisture, and resists fading, drying, or feathering.

name: Fenty Beauty Poutsicle Hydrating Lip Stain
description: Glossy color that leaves a soft, lasting tint with all-day hydration. Lightweight, feather-resistant formula locks in moisture for smooth, nourished lips. Buildable, sheer-to-medium coverage in vibrant shades.

name: Laura Mercier Caviar Stick Eye Shadow
description: Effortless, creamy formula glides on smoothly with rich, blendable color. Longwearing, crease-proof, smudge-proof, and waterproof for up to 24 hours. Comfortable, transfer-resistant, and safe for sensitive skin and contact lens wearers.

name: r.e.m. beauty On Your Collar Plumping Lip Gloss
description: Instantly enhances lips with a cooling, tingling effect and a refreshing mint scent. Hydrating formula with a non-sticky, glossy finish leaves lips softer, smoother, and visibly fuller. Effortless application with a contoured, slanted-tip applicator.

name: Fenty Beauty Killawatt Freestyle Highlighter
description: Weightless, blendable formula delivers a soft glow or intense radiance for face and eyes. Superfine shimmer melts into skin for a smooth, long-lasting finish.
